reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works to Reduce Odor
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical to use these because I didn’t necessarily believe the hype that a bar soap could help with odor “down there”. My experience with bar soap is that it’s too drying and I wind up with itchy, dry skin, something I don’t want to deal with on my sensitive lady parts.This soap is made with nourishing oils like coconut, strawberry, and olive, and also contains shea butter.It also contains lauric acid, an ingredient that’s good for its antibacterial benefits.The included mesh bag makes it easy to get this soap into a fantastic lather. It rinses off easily and my skin has that squeaky-clean feeling afterwards. I worried about that when I first used it because that often means dry skin will soon follow. So far, so good though. I’ve not had any itching or irritation and so far it’s been doing an amazing job of combating odor. I’m actually quite impressed with how fresh I feel all day.The scent is yummy but doesn’t last so you don’t have to worry about smelling like a strawberry patch all day. It’s a nice scent to float around me when I’m showering.I will definitely be getting these bars again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Jabón normal para las manos
reviews.reviewText: Con su aroma fresco, como la brisa de la aurora,limpia y purifica, sin rastro de demora.No solo para la dama en su alcoba soñada,sino para todos, en la vida desplegada.En la espuma que acaricia, en el lavado cotidiano,el jabón de fresa despliega su encanto temprano.No solo para la piel de suave textura,sino para las manos, en su gesto de ternura.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The acrid smell was not great :(
reviews.reviewText: The soap itself is great, but the smell...is beyond pungent. Just removing the bar from the wrapper filled my entire bathroom with a strong smell of either strawberry daiquiri or a strawberry milkshake starting to turn. I'm assuming that's the lactic acid in it, but it is a powerful scent. I still wanted to give this soap a shot and only used a small bit of the lather to clean myself to make sure it didn't leave me smelling heavily of whatever that "extra" smell was on top of the strawberries. If it were more strawberry-scented instead, I'd probably rate this higher. As far as the soap itself goes, it lathers well and seems fairly gentle, but we will have to see if it keeps my pH balanced like it's supposed to or if it throws it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am a huge fan!
reviews.reviewText: I love yoni soap! This strawberry scented yoni soap does not disappoint! I am a big fan of yoni soaps, and this one stands up to many others I have tried. The fragrance is not overpowering, yet is light and feminine. The whole point of yoni soaps is to keep your pH balanced and your lady parts smelling fresh and natural, rather than funky and unwelcoming. This soap does it's job. After using it, and throughout the day I felt clean and fresh. Like I said, the scent wasn't overpowering, no one wants to give off the aroma of a fruit salad either. Because let's face it, then people start to wonder what you're hiding with all that perfume. 10/10, will buy again, and would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soap does not lather up a lot but does provide just the right amount of suds to leave you feeling fresh and clean. It rinses off well with no residue. The strawberry scent is very subtle and not overpowering. I didn't experience any itching or irritation while using either. Very happy that this soap lived up to my expectations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This soap has a strawberry scent that is ok but I find a little sweet for my preference. The soap came with a little pouch that helps build up a good lather quickly! It washes off easily without drying out my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Pretty and Smells Great
reviews.reviewText: It came in minimal packaging, 2 beautiful soaps nicely packed in a fitted white padded envelope, thumbs up for that. In each of the soap box, comes with a bag that you can place the soap in, theoretically it will generate more bubble when the soap is placed inside.We follow the instructions, put the soap in the bag and rub in the hands to generate foams, place it on the private part, and wait for 3 minutes, the light scent of strawberries is delicious and yummy, the 3 layers itself is mesmerizing, overall the experience to use the soap is soothing and comforting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Soap doesn’t belong in areas that are biologically self-cleaning!
reviews.reviewText: This soap is an adequate substitute for any regular bar soap.Use it on your hands, feet, legs, etc. all of your external parts.It’s also pretty soap. If you’re into soap sculpture, the tricolor effect would be interesting in a soap sculpture.It’s great that it’s vegan, but it’s also overpriced for even two bars of soap.
